casebody.data:
GLENSHAW GLASS CO., Inc., Petitioner, v. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE, Respondent. No. 9375. United States Court of Appeals Third Circuit. Argued Oct. 10, 1947. Decided Oct. 21, 1947. Ben W. Heineman, Chicago, 111., Swiren, .Heineman & Antonow, Chicago, 111., for appellant. Harry Baum, Washington, D. C., for respondent.

Before BIGGS, ALBERT LEE STEPHENS and MARIS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The decision of the Tax. Court is affirmed.
